data.name: Less Cramped JTrader
data.description:
DO NOT INSTALL STYLISH TO USE THIS STYLE. USE STYLUS INSTEAD. https://add0n.com/stylus.html

Makes JTrader use all available space at the largest breakpoint and removes scrollbars from the market tables.
